Title: Paragraph
data: This project has been made possible through a collaboration with La_Bibliothèque : a french library / mediatheque. They gave me "carte blanche" to represent the data linked to the documents people borrow over time. The result is a four-pannel dynamic data-visualisation.

Title: Paragraph
data: A fun part of the project is the backend. I didn't want to write code for a server or a database but I still wanted the folks at La_Bibliothèque to be able to push new data to the visualisations. So I did just that by writing a backend page enabling users with the credentials to push data to the repo via the github api. And it works pretty well !
